nodes.title: I.2. Residential Structures in Other Locations: Religious and Elite Residences
General site characteristics
nodes.body: The large cave of Gyamchung PukpaGyam chung phug pa is situated in a limestone range that bounds the north side of a large plain. The cave towers some 550 m above this plain and occupies a highly isolated and defensible location. This capacious cave has two entrances separated by a distance of 46 m: northwest mouth (26 m wide) and south mouth (16 m wide).
